```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#read in the data with translated rows
df1 <- read.csv("/work/pilot/data/processed/articles_with_hits.csv")
```

```{r}
#save only collumns that are important
df1 <- df1 %>%
  select(file, text, topic_1:topic_10, eng_text)

```

```{r}
#save as csv file 
write_csv(df1, "/work/pilot/data/processed/articles_for_label.csv")
```
